definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character

sentences.english: Field observations were carried out at dozens of crosswalks in Xi an.
sentences.chinese: 在西安市選取了數十條人行橫道進行實地觀測。

sentences.english: Building integrated wiring on-site installation supervision and commissioning.
sentences.chinese: 監督樓宇綜合佈線實地安裝和試運行。

sentences.english: The Ecraft workh element of Taurus can leadvertisement to strength mainly because well mainly because desire for solid ground form and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座祈望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: To talk or act insincerely or misleadingly; equivocate.
sentences.chinese: 不忠實地或誤導地說或做。

sentences.english: The Earth element of Taurus brings strength and the desire for solid ground form. and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座渴望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: Evaluated of hydrogen uptake and permeation in Zinc-Nickel alloy and metals by an electrochemical technique.
sentences.chinese: 電化學滲透方法能夠實地監控和評價鍍層的氫脆性能。

sentences.english: The player takes his or her first stroke at the teeing ground.
sentences.chinese: 玩家需要他或她第一次中風後，在實地劃定。

sentences.english: A night of depth, stretched to the horizon of the curtain of night is covering up my line of sight thickly.
sentences.chinese: 夜已深，一望無垠的夜幕厚厚實實地遮掩着我的視線。

sentences.english: The distribution was consistent with local yield and landform.
sentences.chinese: 分佈情況與實地的產量和地形地貌基本一致。

sentences.english: Thank god this thug has finally come back down to earth.
sentences.chinese: 感謝上帝，這狂徒終於腳踏實地。

sentences.english: Many college students used to rush through their summer fieldwork projects.
sentences.chinese: 很多大學生過去常常對暑期實地調查作業草草了事。

sentences.english: Ears, seeing is believing, we conducted on-the-spot visit.
sentences.chinese: 耳聽爲虛，眼見爲實，我們進行了實地參觀。

sentences.english: I am also a field investigator for MUFON on a part time basis.
sentences.chinese: 我也是一個實地調查的MUFON兼職的基礎上。

sentences.english: When establishing the OD matrix, the field OD investigation is generally required.
sentences.chinese: 建立基年OD表時，通常需要進行實地交通調查。

sentences.english: The equipment has all been field- tested.
sentences.chinese: 這些設備都已經過實地試驗。

definition: to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to unfold/to carry out/to be in full swing/to launch
